author: Aaron Peck
comment: Great app. It provides some great insight into how much you're using your phone. One issue though, when wanting to not automatically track location, unchecking that box isn't being saved. Every time I check back the box is checked again. I'm not seeing a "save" button so I assume that it's supposed to save changes automatically. Until that's resolved, 3 stars is the best I can recommend.

reply.author: Emberify - Instant
reply.content: Hi Aaron, thanks for the feedback. We will be sure to handle that bug in our next update!

author: jdb
comment: nice idea but it's really limited in the ways you can browse the tracked data. the information is all their but you can not make use of it in any functional way. there are preconfigured summaries but absolutely no options to customize. if it were possible to set filters to manage what days is stored or even viewed then it would be much more useful. as it is, not useful if you want deeper insight then what is provided in the summaries.

reply.author: Emberify - Instant
reply.content: Hi, you can access your data in the history pages & also through Instant coach. Could you please email us on shashwat@emberify.com so we can understand how you would like your data better. Thank you!

author: Anu suya
comment: Good app.thank you, helps me a lot everyday in tracking my activities.

author: Gwen
comment: Hey Instant, I can't save places anymore, help??  I love this app help me out!!

reply.author: Emberify - Instant
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback. Could you email us on shashwat@emberify.com with the issue that you're facing when you add places.

author: Ankit Shaw
comment: Perfect app

author: Shahed Kojak
comment: First of all I have the pro version and I decided to depend on it for a university project.. unfortunately many things put me down .. I really don't know where to begin .. one thing that I noticed that most of us will not notice is that the data itself that it tracks is not accurate .. since I had to be detailed I was tracking the time I spent on each app and I realized that it was much less than what I expected.. but couldn't tell for sure ..until I came across Skype where it said that I spent 5 mins on one day .. I went back to Skype and checked the duration of my call on that day .. and it was much of a differnce.. that is only one issue .. but really an important one cause all the others such as graphs and how easy it is to access data is not really important if the data itself is not right!!!!

author: Josue Roberto
comment: It's awesome to get to know the data this generates. I'd put it to better use, like say... Being able to ask the coach to notify me when I get to 30 min of use of Instagram so I'm reminded to stop using it longer than that

reply.author: Emberify - Instant
reply.content: We will plan for individual app limits in our next update!

author: Chris Gardner
comment: 1Good concept but isn't worth a damn unless you have the pro version! Severely limited on the free version. 5 days and it only tracked 1and said I slept 2.3 hours. It's got a ways to go..

author: Robert Marshall
comment: High potential, but hard to get a look at underlying data and info.  On the weekly stats for places, it says "Add places to view weekly stats" but I have work and home set up in my places. It provides the data when you click on individual days, but won't provide the summary for the week. There are similar other short comings in a promising app.

reply.author: Emberify - Instant
reply.content: Hi Robert, we are looking into the issue and should have a fix in our upcoming update.

author: Roberto Nieto
comment: Great app, great support. Still some points to improve, like places and very few options in free version, but everything else great.  Lets you export your data 👍

reply.author: Emberify - Instant
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! We have some updates coming up in the next few weeks.
